content:
231 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
    a) for Philosophy, five (5) `O` level credit 
passesto include English Language 
Mathematics, at a maximum of two (2) 
sittings.  A pass in two (2) principal subjects 
at the NCE.   
b) for Religion requires five `O` level credit 
passes ata maximum of two (2) sitting s and 
which must include English Language, 
Mathematics, Religious studies and passes in 
two (2) principal subjects at the NCE.  
(vi) FED-LAFIA requires 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Literature in 
English and any other relevant subjects.  
(vii) IBADAN and LAGOS requires five (5) 'O' level 
credit passes to include English Language and one 
(1)Arts subject.  
(viii) LAGOS requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, one (1)Arts and 
any two (2) Social Sciences and Science.  Civic 
Education is also accepted.  
(ix) NDU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language and any other four (4) subjects, 
two (2) of Arts and two (2) Social Sciences.  
(x) OAU requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, one (1)Arts subject and 
'O' level pass in Mathematics.  
(xi) OOU, IBADAN, AAU, OAU, KSU, and IMSU require 
at least 'O' level pass in Mathematics.  
(xii) PHC requires a credit pass in Mathematics.  
(xiii) UHIELE requires five (5) 'O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, and any two (2) other 
Arts or Social Science subjects. at least 'O' level 
pass in Mathematics. Candidates MUST be 
sponsored by a Catholic Diocese.  
 
REQUIREMENTS
